subject: Order #SSN5857
description_text:
Good morning,

I placed an order (#SSN5857) on the 7th of January for a gear shifter, I paid extra for quicker shipping but I still didn’t get any email saying that the order was dispatched, can you please check on that and let me know the order status? 
Thank you!

Best regards,
Jose Ferreira

conversations.body_text: Hi José Ferreira,     We apologize for the delay. We have confirmed that your package was shipped yesterday. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231333166
